attributes.action: encourage the BBC to guarantee the future of 6 Music.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Times has reported today (26/2/2010) that the BBC intend to axe Radio 6Music.  We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to remind the BBC of its public service remit and its duty to generate and maintain quality programming on both radio and television.  We feel that the abolition of 6Music, which is a focal point for new music and innovative programming, would be directly contrary to these aims.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government and so this is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
